channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 21:10 ATTENTION !!! Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs). Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs).
item.description: 🟠 21:10 ATTENTION !!! Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs). Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs). #Пологивский_район This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
